abstract.p: P F Chang's China Bistro restaurant chain plans to open new restaurant at The Westchester, White Plains, NY shopping mall; photo (S)

block.p: A restaurant chain that began in the Southwest seven years ago is coming to Westchester. P. F. Chang's China Bistro, with 41 restaurants around the country, will open on July 10 in The Westchester in White Plains. The 253-seat restaurant will boast 8-foot tall fake Ming Dynasty horses at its entrance and will feature traditional dishes from the major regions of China.

A restaurant chain that began in the Southwest seven years ago is coming to Westchester. P. F. Chang's China Bistro, with 41 restaurants around the country, will open on July 10 in The Westchester in White Plains. The 253-seat restaurant will boast 8-foot tall fake Ming Dynasty horses at its entrance and will feature traditional dishes from the major regions of China.
The chain spent $1.6 million decorating the nearly 7,000 square feet of newly created space in The Westchester, said Dan Stefankiewicz, P. F. Chang's operating partner.
